COMMENT_TX: $the ball rolled to the edge of the dirt but no one was there until Bill Mueller ran over from the SS area
$the ball hopped up and struck Tony Womack on the left collarbone; he was taken for precautionary x-rays that were negative
$Jeff Suppan started down the line and then stopped; 3B coach Jose Oquendo yelled to go and Suppan started again but then stopped and tried to get back to 3B
$a full lunar eclipse occured during the game; the first time for an eclipse during a World Series game
